info.title: Auto-generated OAS of Accountill using OOPS

200.description: PDF created and email sent successfully

500.description: Failed to generate PDF or send email

404.description: Clients not found or an error occurred

200.description: Successful operation: password reset flow completed for the user (either forgot password or reset password steps).

422.description: Unprocessable entity: user not found or reset token is invalid/expired

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: User email address used to sign in

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Request body containing the user's email for password reset

422.description: User does not exist in our database

404.description: Profile not found or profile already exists.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the profile to delete

parameters.name: searchQuery
parameters.description: Query parameter to filter invoices by creator

parameters.name: searchQuery
parameters.description: User id used to filter invoices by the creator
